name: Hungry Cats 3D: All you can eat!
name_original: Hungry Cats 3D: All you can eat!
description:
Eat as much food as you can! Use two fingers to control the cat's both paws. Slide as much food, by using the cat's paws, towards the cat to score points. Slide the bombs away from the cat. What will be your highscore?

Collect coins to unlock new skins and keep improving your score.

Features:
* Simple and Smooth gameplay
* 3D graphics
* Skin unlockables
